Text:
I really hope this one works for you guys!

My Apologies again for the previous 2
v.2 quality, TOC @ the end of the books, nowhere near retail/v.5 but readable.
You're very welcome! I hope you enjoy them :)

I can't seem to get these .epub files to work on my kindle, even though .epub is suppose to work. Not sure if it's kindle, this torrent, or something about these .epub files and my kindle... I got the .mobi version which works great. Good formatting and everything :)

Kindle uses MOBI format - Use a free program like Calibre to convert from EPUB
thx for the upload seems to be working great
